alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Bayard, or near Fruit Cove, moving south at 15 mph. Additional are over eastern Clay county moving south. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Fleming Island, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin, Picolata, Switzerland and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval
